headline: Moody’s Corporation to Present at the Bernstein Strategic Decisions Conference on May 28, 2025
summary: NEW YORK, May 26, 2025--Moody’s Corporation (NYSE: MCO) announced today that Rob Fauber, President and Chief Executive Officer, will speak at the Bernstein Strategic Decisions Conference on Wednesday, May 28, 2025. The presentation will begin at approximately 11:00 a.m. Eastern Time and will be webcast live. The webcast will be accessible at Moody’s Investor Relations website, ir.moodys.com.
